text: Pen yad bɨ sawl tek takaw apin ak, nɨbi ke yɨp gem anɨb apin. Yɨp dɨl, gɨtep gɨpin ak agyɨkɨpɨkep ak pen, anɨb ak ma gɨpɨm. Nɨgɨm. Yad bɨ tam okok tek mɨdebin ak pen, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb bɨawl yɨbɨl okok mɨdebal apɨm ak, kɨli bɨawl okok yad bɨ sɨkol ak agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Mel yɨbɨl.
